#### Official STATA Cheatsheets
These are official <strong><a href="https://www.stata.com/news/conferences/flyers/statacheatsheets.pdf" target="_blank">STATA cheatsheets</a></strong>. Don’t even try to process all of the info contained in these, it’s a lot! But looking through the Data Analysis page will give you an idea of what’s possible. The page on Data Visualization shows many options for graphing your data.


#### Functions Cheatsheet
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE }
library(flextable)
flextable(read.csv("/Users/home_folder/econ5060_website/Course Coverage and Cheatsheets(List of STATA functions).csv"))
```
